body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting CarzRUs customer support. My name is Ryan Rogers. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi there! My name is Shirley Lopez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Shirley! How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit confused about the inventory availability. Can you help me with that?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Shirley. To better assist you, could you please provide me with your vehicle's VIN number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five six eight seven two zero one four three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Shirley. And lastly, can you confirm the color of your vehicle?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Shirley. Is there anything else you need assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Shirley. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a wonderful day!
